text:
感謝 2022、2023「金馬創投會議 ✕ 金音創作獎共創媒合活動」
共計 94 組音樂人、113 組企劃案出席參與
今年延續共創概念 誠摯邀請
12-15 屆金音獎入圍者
以及 2022、2023 媒合活動的參與團隊
一同參加「 2024 金馬創投會議 ✕ 金音創作獎 共創媒合活動 」
活動包含說明會、媒合會議及交流酒會
2024 金馬創投會議入選企劃案 已正式公開
trans:
Thank you to the 2022 and 2023 "Golden Horse Creative Investment Conference ✕ Golden Melody Award Co-Creation Matchmaking Event"
A total of 94 groups of musicians and 113 project proposals attended and participated
This year, continuing the co-creation concept, we sincerely invite
The 12th-15th Golden Melody Award nominees
As well as the teams participating in the 2022 and 2023 matchmaking events
To join the "2024 Golden Horse Creative Investment Conference ✕ Golden Melody Award Co-Creation Matchmaking Event"
The event includes an information session, matchmaking meetings, and a networking reception
The selected projects for the 2024 Golden Horse Creative Investment Conference have been officially announced
